meanings.definition: The outer surface or structure of something
meanings.sent1: The exterior of the house was painted a bright blue.
meanings.sent2: The exterior of the car was shiny and clean.
meanings.sent3: The exterior of the cake was decorated with colorful frosting.
meanings.sent4: The exterior of the forest seemed to glow in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The exterior of the book had a beautiful illustration on the cover.

meanings.definition: Situated on or relating to the outside of something
meanings.sent1: She admired the exterior walls of the castle.
meanings.sent2: The exterior door was painted red.
meanings.sent3: The exterior view from the window was breathtaking.
meanings.sent4: His exterior demeanor was calm despite the chaos inside.
meanings.sent5: The exterior temperature was perfect for a picnic.

meanings.definition: The external appearance or aspect of something
meanings.sent1: The car's sleek exterior caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The building's exterior was modern and impressive.
meanings.sent3: The exterior of the situation seemed dire, but there was hope.
meanings.sent4: Her exterior confidence masked her inner doubts.
meanings.sent5: The exterior of the mountain was covered in snow, creating a stunning view.
